scripts.validate: yarn run validate.types && yarn run validate.format && yarn run validate.test

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: yarn run validate.types && yarn run validate.format

dependencies-comments.tslib: A runtime library that optimises TypeScript applications when the `importHelpers` option is enabled in `tsconfig.json`.

devDependencies-comments.@types/node: A set of type definitions for Node modules used in configuration files.
devDependencies-comments.@types/prettier: A set of type definitions for Prettier configuration files.
devDependencies-comments.@vitest/coverage-c8: A Vitest plugin that provides code coverage.
devDependencies-comments.@vitest/ui: A Vitest plugin that provides a user interface in the web browser.
devDependencies-comments.prettier: Prettier; an opinionated code formatter that respects the `.editorconfig` file.
devDependencies-comments.prettier-plugin-organize-imports: A Prettier plugin that sorts import statements and removes unused ones.
devDependencies-comments.simple-git-hooks: A tool that manages Git hooks, e.g. to validate the software quality before committing changes to the repository.
devDependencies-comments.typescript: TypeScript; a statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
devDependencies-comments.vite: Vite; a frontend build tool with native support for hot module replacement.
devDependencies-comments.vitest: Vitest; a unit testing framework that uses the Vite build configuration natively.
